scripts.startup: disableAi(1) createUnit('mainteepee', 0, startLocation(0)) createUnit('mage_tower', 1, startLocation(1)) showMessage('Welcome', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('FirstThing', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('WillBeUsingIndian', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('NeedWorkers', 'Resources') setDisplayText('ProduceWorker') objective= 'produce_worker'
scripts.resourceHarvested: if objective=='Harvest_Gold_And_Stone' and resourceAmount('gold', 0)>=600 and resourceAmount('stone', 0)>=550 then showMessage('HarvestGoldAndStoneDone', 'WellDone') showMessage('ResourceInformation', 'Resources') showMessage('GetWood', 'Resources') setDisplayText('GetWoodob') objective= 'harvest_wood' end if objective=='harvest_wood' and resourceAmount('wood', 0)>=550 then showMessage('MeetingPoint', 'WellDone') showMessage('UseMeetingPoint', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('MeetingPoint2', 'Tricks') showMessage('Thirdcommand', 'Buildings') showMessage('Thirdcommand2', 'Buildings') showMessage('Thirdcommand3', 'Buildings') showMessage('Thirdcommand4', 'Buildings') setDisplayText('UseThirdCommand') objective= 'produce_tent' end
scripts.unitCreatedOfType:
if objective=='produce_worker' then WorkerUnit=lastCreatedUnit() showMessage('Select', 'WellDone') showMessage('Select2', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('ExampleWorker', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('Command', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('FirstCommand', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('SecondCommand', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('SecondCommand2', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('TestSecondCommand', 'GlestBasicTutorial') setDisplayText('MoveWorker') objective= 'move_worker'
createUnit('worker', 0, {80,70}) SecondWorkerUnit=lastCreatedUnit() cell_event1 = registerCellTriggerEventForUnitToUnit(WorkerUnit,SecondWorkerUnit) end
if objective=='produce_tent' then showMessage('ProduceStickfighter', 'WellDone') setDisplayText('ProduceStickfighter2') objective= 'stickfighter' end
if objective=='stickfighter' then setDisplayText('WellDoneNextTutorial') setPlayerAsWinner(0) timer_event1 = startTimerEvent() objective= 'end' end
scripts.cellTriggerEvent: --print('Cell Event ' .. triggeredCellEventId() ) if triggeredCellEventId() == cell_event1 then clearDisplayText() showMessage('MoveBack', 'WellDone') showMessage('MoveBack2', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('MoveBack3', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('HarvestGoldandStone', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('HarvestGoldandStone2', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('UseHarvestGoldandStone', 'GlestBasicTutorial') showMessage('HarvestGoldandStone3', 'GlestBasicTutorial') setDisplayText('HarvestGoldandStoneobjective') unregisterCellTriggerEvent(cell_event1) objective= 'Harvest_Gold_And_Stone' end
scripts.timerTriggerEvent: if triggeredTimerEventId() == timer_event1 then if timerEventSecondsElapsed(triggeredTimerEventId()) >= 9 then endGame() stopTimerEvent(triggeredTimerEventId()) end end
